text: (napiye!) Avarkalukkuk kotiya vetanai kotukka kutiyavarkalaiye, avarkal mitu atikkam celuttumaru kiyama nal varai nam ceyvomenru unkal iraivan arivittatai (avarkalukku ninaivuttuviraka) - niccayamaka um iraivan tantanaiyalippatil tiviramanavan - anal niccayamaka avan mikavum mannippavanakavum, kirupaiyalanakavum irukkinran
